resources.string: Looks like you have denied location permission, this app requires the use of location to be able to scan nearby devices

" You have permanently denied the location permission for the app, This app needs this permission to work. In order to remedy this problem, a page will open and you will have to go to \"application authorization\" select Eseo c'est bo la vie and authorize this application."
Your Device is not compatible with BLE
" Image indicating the status of the led"
you have to connect via the BLE on a device to connect via the internet (I know it\'s strange but don\'t worry it\'s normal, it\'s to retrieve the identifier)
